full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RIMS NAD ZHI BAR BYED PA'I GZUNGS SNGAGS BYIN RLABS CAN 'DOD GSOL SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI ME RTA LO LHA ZHOL GYI PHYOGS SU 'BRUM BU NAD RIMS THANG BU BYUNG BA MYUR DU ZHI PHYIR RIMS NAD ZHI BA'I GZUNGS SNGAGS BYIN RLABS CAN 'DOD GSOL DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI KUN LA PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM BZANG POS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, @004B ^ SH'AKYA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
